top_issue.title: [circt-verilog][arcilator] Inconsistent compilation behavior: direct array indexing in always_ff sensitivity list vs. intermediate wire

reasoning.summary: This appears to be a NEW BUG with similarities to existing Arc/arcilator issues but with a distinct root cause.
key_findings: Root cause is specifically in InferStateProperties.cpp line 211 - applyEnableTransformation function
Type safety bug: IntegerType cast fails on unpacked array types
No existing issues specifically mention this function or this type of casting failure
Issue #9469 is closest but deals with llhd.constant_time legalization, not type casting assertions
The crash occurs at a different location (Casting.h line 566) vs other arcilator assertion failures
evidence_for_new_issue: Specific function name 'applyEnableTransformation' not found in any related issues
InferStateProperties.cpp line 211 not mentioned in search results
Type casting from unpacked array to IntegerType is a specific pattern not covered in existing issues
Shift register pattern with array state is a specific triggering condition
